name: [Group7]Pray, prey
description:
"Pray, prey" is an up to  3 player couch party game featuring a fierce bird and a scared mouse. Possible scared mice! 

- Use the items in your environment to achieve your goals!

- Use barns and bushes to hide from the mighty hawk! (at least for a while)

- Use the pipes to swiftly move around the level!

- Use the mouse traps to deal unavoidable damage to the hawk !

- Make sure you have enough points to finish the level or else you will enter......

FRENZY MODE!!!!

You have sixty seconds to get minimal required points to win the level. If you don't have them by the time the timer reaches zero, the hawk wins!!!

All this and more in......

PRAY PREY!!
